comments.body: Do you think we need one of these tests for `minimalPropsForSmoothedLineChartWithNaNs`?

Great question! This is tested here: https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/add53130b009dc42f92cddfbb78dacef6c288ce1/mlflow/server/js/src/experiment-tracking/components/MetricsPlotView.test.js#L400-L401
